name: Italia Ricci
info:
• 简体中文名: 伊塔莉·里奇
  • 别名: Stephanie Italia Ricci
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1986-10-29
  • 未婚夫: Robbie Amell
  • 出生地: 加拿大,安大略省,里士满希尔
detail: Stephanie Italia Ricci (Italian pronunciation: [iˈtaːlja ˈrittʃi]; born October 29, 1986) is a Canadian actress who is best known for playing April Carver in the ABC Family series Chasing Life. She also co-starred as Maggie Winnock in the Cartoon Network live-action series Unnatural History and had a recurring role as Sasha in the Comedy Central series Secret Girlfriend.
